definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: She is dismayed at the news of her husband's failure.
sentences.chinese: 她驚悉丈夫失敗的消息，非常驚慌。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Aili finds out that she has contracted gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 其間，艾莉驚悉自己得了胃癌。

sentences.english: Shocked to learn of your mother death I express heartfelt condolence in your affliction.
sentences.chinese: 驚悉你母親去世，謹此表示深切的慰問。

sentences.english: To our astonishment we learn from your telegram, that you refused to accept the goods .
sentences.chinese: 從您來電中我們驚悉你們拒收這批貨物。

sentences.english: She was dismayed at the news of her husband 's failure.
sentences.chinese: 她驚悉丈夫失敗的消息，非常驚慌。

sentences.english: In a month I was shocked I doubled the sum.
sentences.chinese: 驚悉我在一個月的總和翻了一番。
